message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to make a competitive offer. I'm offering it to you for $150. What do you think?
I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $130 for the product. Can you meet me halfway?

I understand you're looking to save some money, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm not willing to go as low as $130. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my original offer, so I'll counter with $140. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to pay $135 for the product. Can you consider this offer?

I understand you're still looking to save some money, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession. I'll counter with $137.50. I think this is a fair price considering the value of the product. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, Alice. However, I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to pay $132 for the product. Can you consider this offer?

I understand you're still looking to save some money, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession. I'll counter with $135. I think this is as low as I can go without losing money on the deal. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, Alice. However, I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to pay $130 for the product. Can you consider this offer?

I'm not willing to go any lower than $135, Bob. I've already made significant concessions. I'm willing to meet you halfway from your last offer, so I'll counter with $132.50. This is my final offer. What do you think?

I appreciate your final offer, Alice, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to pay $130 for the product. This is my final offer. If you can't meet me at this price, I'll have to consider buying from John for $120.
